properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. 04 AND 05 JUL ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      04-55.97N 050-10.03W AND 04-15.92N 049-24.47W.
   B. 06 AND 07 JUL ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-49.03N 048-05.95W AND 04-15.98N 049-27.38W.
   C. 08 JUL ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-58.17N 047-43.52W AND 04-11.02N 049-17.38W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 10 JUL.
